description: Scribe plugin hooks: session state display and character state update prompts

hooks.prompt: A file was just written. Check if it appears to be a chapter draft or edited chapter file (matching patterns like '(draft)', '(edited-', '(scenes)', '(beats)' in the filename, or a file in an arcs/ directory). If it IS a chapter-related file, add a brief reminder: 'Consider updating character states in the knowledge base for any changes in this chapter. Use /scribe:kb to update.' If it is NOT a chapter file, say nothing (return empty). Do not block the write.
